name: Super Simple Social Tags
author: Beefy Software

sections.description:
Super Simple Social Tags is a super lightweight plugin to add social media meta tags for Facebook and Twitter. Adds tags (in document ) to display the WordPress featured image in your social media posts. No settings page necessary. Just activate and go.

Perfect for sites that use the Genesis framework and would rather not install bloated SEO plugins with useless features.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire super-simple-social-tags folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That’s it. Whenever your post is shared on Facebook or Twitter, the featured image for the post is displayed.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the entire super-simple-social-tags folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That’s it. Whenever your post is shared on Facebook or Twitter, the featured image for the post is displayed.

What does this plugin do?

Super Simple Social Tags adds tags (in document ) to display the WordPress featured image in your social media posts.

Why did we create this plugin?

We got sick and tired of bloated SEO plugins that slow down your site and have numerous security issues.

Where is the settings page?

There is no settings page. Super Simple Social Tags was designed to be super simple to use. Just activate and go.

short_description: Super Simple Social Tags is a super lightweight plugin to add social media meta tags for Facebook and Twitter. Adds tags to posts.
